mapper.select: select num, cname, image, ad_subject,ad_num,gender,age,salary, ad_content,ad_job,ad_area,ad_time,ad_period,content, to_char(advertise_date , 'YYYY.MM.DD') as advertise_date from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from advertise order by num desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
select count (*) as cnt from advertise
select cname from advertise where num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into user_enroll values (#{cname}, #{id}, seq.nextval, #{image}, #{title}, #{age}, #{career}, #{achieve}, #{loc},#{opencount}, sysdate)
